name: Defenders of the Harrowed Gates
description:
Halloween has fallen upon us again, Satan's forces are empowered and thirsty for the souls of innocent souls. You must defend the gate to heaven at all costs! DOTHG is a fun and challenging tower defenders game where killing your enemy once isn't enough!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Team:

Zombie Crunch

Members:

Me - Tanicorn(Programmer, Artist)

Liam Laverty - SilverMedallion(Programmer)

Joseph Scobby - Scobmyster(Programmer)

Cyprian Przybyla - Cyprian81(Artist)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

How To Play:

Spacebar - Switch camera

Click on plots of land and click the tower you want to build.

Towers cannot be built on the opposite land at the same location, heaven and hell are connected in a way that binds them forever.

The more demons you destroy, the more halo's angels can give you.

The demons are empowered by the Halloween craze, they will keep coming back stronger than every time. You must banish them to hell and destroy them there!

IMPORTANT: To play level 2 to 5 you must use the level select menu

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The game was made in 48 hours, almost all assets are made by the team. The only assets that were not made by us was the music and sound effects.

https://opengameart.org/content/space-halloween
